{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21483v1", "title": "Functoriality of toric coherent-constructible correspondence", "summary": "A morphism from a diagonalizable group $G$ to a torus of a toric variety $X$
induces an action of $G$ on $X$. We prove the category of ind-coherent sheaves
on the quotient stack is equivalent to the category of constructible sheaves on
a cover of a real torus with singular support contained in the FLTZ skeleton,
extending Kuwagaki's nonequivariant coherent-constructible correspondence
arXiv:1610.03214. We also and investigate the functoriality of such
correspondence.", "main_category": "math.SG", "categories": "math.SG,math.AG", "published": "2025-04-30T10:07:49Z"}
